description: This Java class serves as a centralized exception handler within a Spring Boot application, providing consistent JSON error responses for various exceptions such as validation errors, resource not found, conflicts, data integrity violations, and unspecified server errors.

classes.name: GlobalExceptionHandler
classes.description: Class annotated as a RestControllerAdvice for handling exceptions globally in a Spring Boot REST API.

methods.name: handleValidation
methods.description: Handles validation errors (MethodArgumentNotValidException) by creating a detailed ApiError response with field violations.

methods.name: handleNotFound
methods.description: Handles NotFoundException, returning a 404 error response with the exception message.

methods.name: handleConflict
methods.description: Handles ConflictException, returning a 409 error response with the exception message.

methods.name: handleDataIntegrity
methods.description: Handles DataIntegrityViolationException, indicating a data integrity violation with a 409 conflict response.

methods.name: handleSpringErrorResponse
methods.description: Handles ErrorResponseException, returning the embedded ProblemDetail object with its status code.

methods.name: handleOther
methods.description: A catch-all handler for any other exceptions, returning a 500 Internal Server Error with a generic message.

methods.name: messageForFieldError
methods.description: Utility method to extract a default message from a FieldError, defaulting to 'Invalid value'.
